attributes.action: tell us how many petitions lodged on the Number 10 petitions site have been accepted and taken up?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This request is to determine the real success of ePetitions as a tool for greater democracy

rejection.details: If you would like more information about the petitions system please email number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
